org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.immutable.entity

Interface ImmutableExperienceHolderData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSerializable, ImmutableDataManipulator<ImmutableExperienceHolderData,ExperienceHolderData>, ValueContainer<ImmutableExperienceHolderData>

    public interface ImmutableExperienceHolderData
extends ImmutableDataManipulator<ImmutableExperienceHolderData,ExperienceHolderData>
    An ImmutableDataManipulator handling the "experience" held by a DataHolder. Usually the mechanics of "experience" is that it is accumulated by a Humanoid and can be spent on creating Enchantments or renaming ItemStacks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutableBoundedValue<Integer> experienceBetweenLevels()
      Gets the ImmutableBoundedValue for the amount of experience required between the current level() and the next level.
      ImmutableBoundedValue<Integer> experienceSinceLevel()
      Gets the ImmutableBoundedValue for the amount of experience gained since the beginning of the current level().
      ImmutableBoundedValue<Integer> level()
      Gets the ImmutableBoundedValue for the current "level" of experience deserved according to the totalExperience() and a function from implementation defining how much experience required per level.
      ImmutableBoundedValue<Integer> totalExperience()
      Gets the total amount of experience stored.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.ImmutableDataManipulator

        asMutable, copy, with, with

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.data.DataSerializable

        getContentVersion, toContainer

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.data.value.ValueContainer

        get, getKeys, getOrElse, getOrNull, getValue, getValues, require, supports, supports

    • Method Detail

      • experienceSinceLevel

        ImmutableBoundedValue<Integer> experienceSinceLevel()
        Gets the ImmutableBoundedValue for the amount of experience gained since the beginning of the current level(). Normally, the higher the level, the more "experience" required to gain another level.
        Returns:
        The bounded value of experience since the beginning of the current level

      • experienceBetweenLevels

        ImmutableBoundedValue<Integer> experienceBetweenLevels()
        Gets the ImmutableBoundedValue for the amount of experience required between the current level() and the next level. This can be presumed to be the supposed "maximum" for the experienceSinceLevel() amount.
        Returns:
        The immutable bounded required experience between levels

      • level

        ImmutableBoundedValue<Integer> level()
        Gets the ImmutableBoundedValue for the current "level" of experience deserved according to the totalExperience() and a function from implementation defining how much experience required per level.
        Returns:
        The current level according to the amount of total experience

      • totalExperience

        ImmutableBoundedValue<Integer> totalExperience()
        Gets the total amount of experience stored.
        Returns:
        The immutable value of total amount of experience
